# Assistente Willuka

Description. 
The package assistente_willuka is used to:
	- Assistente Willuka (willuka.py)

## Installation

Use the package manager [pip](https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/) to install package_name

```bash
pip install assistente_willuka
```
